23 #ifndef VOXBLOX_MESH_MARCHING_CUBES_H_
24 #define VOXBLOX_MESH_MARCHING_CUBES_H_
25 
26 #include "voxblox/mesh/mesh.h"
27 
28 namespace voxblox {
29 
30 class MarchingCubes {
31  public:
32  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
33 
34  static int kTriangleTable[256][16];
35  static int kEdgeIndexPairs[12][2];
36 
37  MarchingCubes() {}
38  virtual ~MarchingCubes() {}
39 
40  static void meshCube(
41  const Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 3, 8>& vertex_coordinates,
42  const Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 8, 1>& vertex_sdf,
43  TriangleVector* triangles) {
44  DCHECK(triangles != NULL);
45 
46  const int index = calculateVertexConfiguration(vertex_sdf);
47 
48  Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 3, 12> edge_coords;
49  interpolateEdgeVertices(vertex_coordinates, vertex_sdf, &edge_coords);
50 
51  const int* table_row = kTriangleTable[index];
52 
53  int edge_index = 0;
54  int table_col = 0;
55  while ((edge_index = table_row[table_col]) != -1) {
56  Triangle triangle;
57  triangle.col(0) = edge_coords.col(edge_index);
58  edge_index = table_row[table_col + 1];
59  triangle.col(1) = edge_coords.col(edge_index);
60  edge_index = table_row[table_col + 2];
61  triangle.col(2) = edge_coords.col(edge_index);
62  triangles->push_back(triangle);
63  table_col += 3;
64  }
65  }
66 
67  static void meshCube(const Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 3, 8>& vertex_coords,
68  const Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 8, 1>& vertex_sdf,
69  VertexIndex* next_index, Mesh* mesh) {
70  DCHECK(next_index != NULL);
71  DCHECK(mesh != NULL);
72  const int index = calculateVertexConfiguration(vertex_sdf);
73 
74  // No edges in this cube.
75  if (index == 0) {
76  return;
77  }
78 
79  Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 3, 12> edge_vertex_coordinates;
80  interpolateEdgeVertices(vertex_coords, vertex_sdf,
81  &edge_vertex_coordinates);
82 
83  const int* table_row = kTriangleTable[index];
84 
85  int table_col = 0;
86  while (table_row[table_col] != -1) {
87  mesh->vertices.emplace_back(
88  edge_vertex_coordinates.col(table_row[table_col + 2]));
89  mesh->vertices.emplace_back(
90  edge_vertex_coordinates.col(table_row[table_col + 1]));
91  mesh->vertices.emplace_back(
92  edge_vertex_coordinates.col(table_row[table_col]));
93  mesh->indices.push_back(*next_index);
94  mesh->indices.push_back((*next_index) + 1);
95  mesh->indices.push_back((*next_index) + 2);
96  const Point& p0 = mesh->vertices[*next_index];
97  const Point& p1 = mesh->vertices[*next_index + 1];
98  const Point& p2 = mesh->vertices[*next_index + 2];
99  Point px = (p1 - p0);
100  Point py = (p2 - p0);
101  Point n = px.cross(py).normalized();
102  mesh->normals.push_back(n);
103  mesh->normals.push_back(n);
104  mesh->normals.push_back(n);
105  *next_index += 3;
106  table_col += 3;
107  }
108  }
109 
110  static int calculateVertexConfiguration(
111  const Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 8, 1>& vertex_sdf) {
112  return (vertex_sdf(0) < 0 ? (1 << 0) : 0) |
113  (vertex_sdf(1) < 0 ? (1 << 1) : 0) |
114  (vertex_sdf(2) < 0 ? (1 << 2) : 0) |
115  (vertex_sdf(3) < 0 ? (1 << 3) : 0) |
116  (vertex_sdf(4) < 0 ? (1 << 4) : 0) |
117  (vertex_sdf(5) < 0 ? (1 << 5) : 0) |
118  (vertex_sdf(6) < 0 ? (1 << 6) : 0) |
119  (vertex_sdf(7) < 0 ? (1 << 7) : 0);
120  }
121 
122  static void interpolateEdgeVertices(
123  const Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 3, 8>& vertex_coords,
124  const Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 8, 1>& vertex_sdf,
125  Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 3, 12>* edge_coords) {
126  DCHECK(edge_coords != NULL);
127  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < 12; ++i) {
128  const int* pairs = kEdgeIndexPairs[i];
129  const int edge0 = pairs[0];
130  const int edge1 = pairs[1];
131  // Only interpolate along edges where there is a zero crossing.
132  if ((vertex_sdf(edge0) < 0 && vertex_sdf(edge1) >= 0) ||
133  (vertex_sdf(edge0) >= 0 && vertex_sdf(edge1) < 0))
134  edge_coords->col(i) = interpolateVertex(
135  vertex_coords.col(edge0), vertex_coords.col(edge1),
136  vertex_sdf(edge0), vertex_sdf(edge1));
137  }
138  }
139 
140  // Performs linear interpolation on two cube corners to find the approximate
141  // zero crossing (surface) value.
142  static inline Point interpolateVertex(const Point& vertex1,
143  const Point& vertex2, float sdf1,
144  float sdf2) {
145  static constexpr FloatingPoint kMinSdfDifference = 1e-6;
146  const FloatingPoint sdf_diff = sdf1 - sdf2;
147  // Only compute the actual interpolation value if the sdf_difference is not
148  // too small, this is to counteract issues with floating point precision.
149  if (std::abs(sdf_diff) >= kMinSdfDifference) {
150  const FloatingPoint t = sdf1 / sdf_diff;
151  return Point(vertex1 + t * (vertex2 - vertex1));
152  } else {
153  return Point(0.5 * (vertex1 + vertex2));
154  }
155  }
156 };
157 
158 } // namespace voxblox
159 
160 #endif // VOXBLOX_MESH_MARCHING_CUBES_H_
